instructions: Open your preferred file manager, tap Internal storage (device name), then tap Pictures . Tap Messages . All your downloaded images, videos, and voice clips will be in the Messages folder.
Open the My files app, then tap Internal storage . Tap Download . All attachments downloaded via Samsung Messages will be in the Download directory.
Open your file manager, tap Internal storage , then WhatsApp . Tap Media . Your files and attachments get stored in their respective folders within WhatsApp's Media directory.

Tap+hold the link or file you wish to download until more options appear, then tap Download link . Open your file manager and go to your Internal storage , then tap Download . All files and attachments downloaded while using Chrome will end up in the Downloads folder.

Open your email with the attachment, then tap the download icon next to the Drive icon. Open your file manager, go to Internal storage , then tap Download . All attachments downloaded from Gmail will be in your Download folder.

Open Safari , then tap on the download link. Tap the download icon in the bottom center of the screen. Tap Save to Files . Ensure Save to Files is enabled, then tap Done . Tap On My iPhone . Select the folder you wish to save your file in.
Open the Files app. Tap an option under Locations to explore your iPhone's downloads. Use the Search option at the top of the screen to quickly look for an item.
